name: Halloween Night Survival 3D
description:
Please check out our new game – Halloween Night Survival!
Halloween Night Survival is a hardcore survival game with a night mode set in a halloween-styled, three-dimensional environment.

Let’s start our survival adventure! The goal of the game is to collect resources, craft tools, weapons, and shelter, and survive as long as possible.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the left controller to move a character. Use the right button for every attack.

Game features:
- offline survival game
- halloween pictures
- cool night landscapes

Let's go party halloween with Halloween Survival 3D! Explore the night, survive through the wild!
